title: He’s Still The Shepherd
description:
God wants to get you back on track. 

 In “He’s Still The Shepherd,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches that, no matter how far you’ve gone off course, God still has His hand over you.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr

To support this ministry and help us continue to reach people all around the world click here: http://www.elevationchurch.org/giving/

Scripture References:

Galatians 3, verses 3-5

Psalm 23, verses 1-4

1 Chronicles 21, verses 1, 12, & 17
